Title: Prohibits certain elected officials from serving as delegates to the constitutional convention
Summary: Prohibits the governor, lieutenant governor, attorney general, comptroller, any state legislator, any elected county, city, town or village official, or any person who currently holds elective office from serving as a delegate to a constitutional convention.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to prohibiting certain elected officials from serving as delegates to the constitutional convention
